name: Oculus Bridge control simulator
description:
The game was made in 24h time perioid during a weekend. Made originally for VR Jam 2021

Probably doesn't work perfectly. Is based on you lifting up your chin to lift up the bridge. If you want to do more sports. try to tip-toe to activate the bridges. Works on Oculus rift. Not sure if it works on other VR-devices. Leave feedback please! :)

#nicesologamedevexperience

Thanks to zapsplat for the high quality music
